item.title: Area study
item.description: An area study is a tool for preparedness that will allow you to make well informed decisions and enable you to plan effectively.

item.title: Crew, Tribe, MAG. Why be a part of one?
item.description: Why Join a Preparedness Group Humans by nature are Tribal. Security: Strength in numbers. Decision Making & Planning: 2 heads are better than 1, 3 better than 2 and so on.

item.title: Meetup: Cyber Security, Safety, & Privacy
item.description: Just want the meat? Defense easy mode (Getting started) Use Signal to message (and convince others to) instead of SMS, Whatsapp and Telegram.
